title: Ethereal Emerald & Polki Diamond Haaram - Timeless Elegance
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds) and Zambian Emeralds. Emeralds are pear-shaped and round cut with VVS clarity. Polki Diamonds exhibit a brilliant luster and weigh approximately 12 carats in total.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a floral motif with alternating Polki diamonds and Emeralds. The central pendant is an impressive pear-shaped emerald, framed by Polki Diamonds in a closed setting. The entire necklace features a delicate, handcrafted bezel setting, highlighting the natural beauty of the gems. Showcases Traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship with meticulous detailing.
colors: and shimmering white from the Polki Diamonds. The contrast creates a vibrant and eye-catching color palette.
occasions: and traditional ceremonies like Seemantham (సీమంతం) or Half-Saree functions (పావుడా). Also suitable for high-end social gatherings and cultural events.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless South Indian jewelry design. The combination of Polki Diamonds and Zambian Emeralds is highly sought after. The handcrafted Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and enhances the gold's natural luster. A heirloom piece to be cherished for generations, embodying elegance and cultural heritage.
